input.sentences: before seeing lights in the night .
output.sentences: Today at the fair I saw a new food that I just had to try; Beer battered cheese on a stick.
After my snack, i went and played some games in hopes to win a stuffed animal.
I didn't get the stuffed animal but I found a new rollercoaster that I just had to go on.
After the rollercoaster, i walked around some more and saw people juggling.
As evening came and the sun started to set, all the rides lite up and the sight was magnificent.
